overview_text:
Newly renovated duplex in highly sought after neighborhood of Forest Lake. Move-in Ready!
2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms with 788 SqFt of living space.  New carpet covers the home, with the exception luxury vinyl in the kitchen and bathroom.
features_text:
New Appliances
Privacy Fence
Pergola & Patio
Water & Swear paid by the owner 
Walking score of 74
Pet friendly
